title: BBC Local Live: Beds, Herts & Bucks - BBC News
summary: around 1,000 staff at the luton hq of holiday company tui have observed a minute 's silence in memory of the victims of the gun attack in tunisia .
bedfordshire police and crime commissioner olly martins says it 's extremely difficult trying to stop people travelling to syria .
police in dunstable have arrested a man in connection with an alleged sexual assault in the town this morning .

documents.title: that 's all folks
text: we 're calling it a week on local live but we 'll be back with you at 08:00 on monday , 6 july with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for bedfordshire , hertfordshire and buckinghamshire .
i hope you have a lovely weekend .
author: Dani Bailey
Beds, Herts & Bucks Live

documents.title: weather : mostly warm and dry
text: after a fine evening with some late sunshine , cloud will thicken with the threat of some thundery showers through the start of the night .
some places may stay mostly dry , others could see torrential downpours and hail .
it will turn drier towards the end of the night but it will be a muggy night for all .
minimum temperature : 17c ( 63f )
tomorrow , a cloudy start but turning brighter through the day .
with light winds , it will feel hot and humid once again with a maximum temperature of 27c ( 81f )
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: watford captain deeney signs new contract
text: watford captain troy deeney has signed a new five-year contract today - it 's fantastic news for the club .
the striker has scored over 20 goals in the last three seasons for the hornets and is a leader both on and off the pitch .
he has scored 81 times for the club since joining five years ago .
author: Geoff Doyle
BBC Three Counties Radio sport

documents.title: dunstable assault : appeal for witnesses
text: a police cordon at grove park in dunstable was lifted about 16:40 , after investigations were ongoing for 10 hours following reports of a sexual assault .
the incident occurred between 02:00 and 06:00 after a man and woman left cookies and cream nightclub , police say .
officers are appealing for any witnesses who may have been in the area .
a 22-year-old man has been arrested and remains in custody .
author: Dani Bailey
Beds, Herts & Bucks Live

documents.title: sexual assault in luton
text: police are appealing for witnesses after a woman was sexually assaulted in luton yesterday morning .
the woman was walking in brooklands close at about 08:30 when she was approached by a man riding a pushbike , who sexually assaulted her .
the man is described as mixed race , in his late 20s , slim , with a cropped afro hair style .
he had a rugged face with a scar or deep wrinkle under his right eye .
author: BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: ladies european masters : charley hull two shots off leader
text: woburn-based charley hull is currently lying two shots off the leader at nine under par after her second round 67 today at the
hertfordshire 's hannah burke is now one under par after nine holes of her second round .
holly aitchison from bedfordshire is also set to make the cut .
she 's already qualified to play in the us open next week and is currently two under par for her round today and one over par overall .
author: Luke Ashmead
BBC Three Counties Radio sport

the silence was observed by around 1,000 staff at the headquarters of the holiday firm tui group in luton , as seen

today the

hoddesdon town play sawbridgeworth town , oxhey jets host afc kempston rovers , ampthill town will play risborough rangers , newport pagnell town take on holmer green and tring athletic have been drawn at home to leverstock green .

a 22-year-old man has been arrested in connection with the incident .

documents.title: heat wave : allergic to the sun
text: while many youngsters will have been loving this weeks heat wave , 18-year-old autumn everitt-brick from welywn garden city does n't share the sentiment .
autumn has to live a near nocturnal life at home as she 's allergic to uv light .
if she 's in direct , strong sunlight it takes just 30 seconds before her skin breaks out into lesions and sores .
`` we thought at the time that because she was pale , she 'd just been in the sun for too long '' , father andy
author: BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: boreham wood : fixtures announced
text: the national league , formerly the football conference , has released its fixtures today .
boreham wood start their first competitive season in the top division of non-league football with a home game against halifax , before away matches at eastleigh and gateshead .
the wood take on braintree on boxing day .
author: Geoff Doyle
BBC Three Counties Radio sport

documents.title: man sentenced for 29 burglaries
text: a man has been sentenced to four and a half years in prison after carrying out 29 burglaries in hertfordshire .

marvyn mulvey , 37 , of no fixed address , admitted carrying out the crimes in south oxhey , watford and rickmansworth , where items including laptops , mobile phones , games consoles , jewellery and cash were stolen .
mulvey , who appeared at st albans crown court , was sentenced to four years for the burglaries and six months for escaping from lawful custody .
he was also given a year , to run concurrently , for attempting to sell a stolen tv at a pawn shop in watford .
author: Tony Fisher
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: bucks fire observe tunisia silence
text: bucks and mk fire service
staff , including colleague just back from sousse , observe a minute 's silence for victims of # tunisia attack

documents.title: man in hospital after flamstead collision
text: a man is in a serious condition in addenbrooke 's hospital following a collision in flamstead , hertfordshire this morning .
the man in his 50s was driving the dark red ford fiesta which collided with a tree alongside chequers hill at about 07:20 and overturned .
police closed the road between the a5 and singlets lane for investigations , and re-opened it at about 10:45 .
author: Dani Bailey
Beds, Herts & Bucks Live

documents.title: british grand prix : home support
text: i made it through the traffic and into silverstone !
there is loads of home support for the british drivers , as you would expect , as the second practice session draws closer .
author: Jonathan Park
Sports Editor, BBC Look East

text: there 's slow traffic on the m1 southbound between j10 and j9 due to an accident , which has been moved to the hard shoulder .
on the m25 there are long delays anti-clockwise from j18-j11 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: police dog training
text: dog handlers at bedfordshire police have been training hard with their pooches over the last six weeks for their license .
held at the headquarters in kempston , the dogs were trained to search for drugs , firearms and cash .
five of the dogs and their handlers were successful and will soon be out patrolling bedfordshire , hertfordshire and cambridgeshire .
you can

documents.title: jiu-jitsu club remembers tunisia victim
text: the
a message
it has asked members to join in with a `` moment of silence '' on the jiu-jitsu mats at watford leisure centre tonight at 20:00 `` which is where he would normally be '' .
author: Katy Lewis
Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: hertsmere honours tunisia attack victims
text: the mayor of hertsmere , councillor martin worster , led a poignant flag-raising ceremony outside the civic offices in borehamwood as part of a nationwide minute of silence in honour of the tunisia attack victims .
special tribute was paid to two victims from bushey , chris dyer , who died in the attack , and his wife gina van dort , who has been seriously injured .
council leader , morris bright , said : `` our thoughts are with the family and friends of those involved in the attack , especially those in our communities touched by this tragedy . ''
author: Katy Lewis
Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: british grand prix : busy camp sites
text: the camp sites around silverstone are looking very crowded .
this is the lichfield farm site , which is privately owned , and the closest site to the track .

Sports Editor, BBC Look East

documents.title: vulcan to appear at shuttleworth
text: the avro vulcan xh558 , which defended the nation against nuclear holocaust during the cold war , will be making one of her final appearances at the
the aeroplane , which is the only flying vulcan in the world , is

sebastian cox , from the raf 's historical branch said : `` if you imagine the classic paper dart then multiply it several hundred times , [ it 's ] this fantastically beautiful triangular shape sweeping across the sky it reminds one of the most amazing bird of prey in flight , but this is a man-made bird of prey . ''
author: Katy Lewis
Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: community want to see luton family 'safely back '
text: a councillor in luton hopes the family of 12
`` police , i understand , have their ongoing investigation , '' councillor tahir khan , who represents the biscot ward where the family lived , said .
`` all of us including the family and the community would like to see this family back , safely back , in luton . ''
author: Dani Bailey
Beds, Herts & Bucks Live

documents.title: weather : very hot , with possible storms
text: it 's a dry and fine day , and this afternoon it will become very hot , especially in bedford and luton as the winds stay light .
the heat could trigger an isolated thunderstorm late in the day .
we 'll see maximum temperatures of 29c ( 84f ) .

text: boreham wood will begin life in the national league with a home game against fc halifax town on saturday , 8 august .
the conference south play-off winners will then travel to eastleigh in their first away game on tuesday , 11 august .

the rail and maritime transport union said the industrial action was the result of a `` comprehensive breakdown '' in industrial relations .

text: there 's slow traffic on the a43 northbound in syresham between abbey road and silverstone due to people travelling to the practice sessions at the british grand prix .
chequers hill in flamstead , hertfordshire remains closed between the a5 and delmerend lane because of an earlier overturned car .
a lane is closed on the a405 near watford and there is heavy traffic on the m25 anti-clockwise from j19-j15 .

documents.title: holiday firm observes silence for tunisia victims
text: about 1,000 staff at tui headquarters in luton have observed midday 's minute 's silence in memory of the victims of last week 's gun attack in tunisia .
the company , which runs holiday firms and thomson and first choice , was responsible for taking some of the holidaymakers caught up in the attack to sousse .

documents.title: teacher with mesothelioma hunts ex-colleagues
text: on

paul crabtree , 67 , ( with daughter amy ) who was diagnosed with the terminal disease in january 2014 , believes he was exposed to the `` hazardous dust and fibres '' when he was employed as a religious education teacher at the bessemer boys school in hitchin - later hitchin school - between 1972 to 1988 .
anyone with any memories of the asbestos removal works in the 1980s or the presence of asbestos within the school and what safety measures , if any , were in place can contact
author: Katy Lewis
Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: busking day to remember 'accordion man '
text: the streets of st albans city centre will be filled with berets and stripy shirts on saturday at a busking day to
john `` paddy '' delaney , who died on 31 march aged 86 , spent more than 35 years entertaining people in the market place .
singer melanie wall , who has organised the event at his former performing spot in upper dagnell street , said she hopes buskers will follow paddy 's style and wear stripy tops and red kerchiefs .
author: Katy Lewis
Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

it is moving but very slowly .

documents.title: yarl 's wood : detainees are self-harming
text: vulnerable detainees held at the
the home office revealed 61 self-harm incidents requiring medical treatment at the bedfordshire centre in 2014 - although that was down from 74 in 2013 .
the centre houses nearly 400 detainees and most are women .

documents.title: wimbledon : bedene out
text: the hertfordshire-based british number two aljaz bedene is out of wimbledon after losing to serbia 's victor troicki .
the slovenian-born player , who has lived in welwyn garden city for eight years , was taking part in his first wimbledon as a british representative .
in the doubles , harpenden 's ed corrie and his partner kyle edmund lost to belarus pair , betov and bury , in three sets .
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: tunisia gun attack : luton travel firms to join minute 's silence
text: a minute 's silence will be held across the country at midday in memory of the victims of last week 's gun attack in tunisia .
about 1,000 staff at the headquarters of luton-based holiday firms thomson and first choice will be taking part .
the 30 britons killed included watford engineer chris dyer whose death was confirmed yesterday .
author: Katy Lewis
Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: 'serious sexual assault ' in dunstable
text: police in dunstable are investigating what they have termed a `` potential serious sexual assault '' in the town earlier this morning .
officers and ambulance crews arrived at grove park at about 06:15 and the scene has been cordoned off .
we 'll bring you more on this story as we get it .

documents.title: police commissioner says 'security services have difficult job '
text: bedfordshire police commissioner olly martins says it 's extremely difficult trying to stop people travelling to syria .
a family of 12 from luton are

mr martins said : `` that highlights what a difficult job we are asking the security services to do we 're talking about the security services having to operate in a space short of having evidence , but still trying to prevent people from getting involved in and supporting an organisation like the so called islamic state . ''

Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to today 's live page for bedfordshire , hertfordshire and buckinghamshire .
we 'll be bringing you all the latest news , sport , leisure , travel and weather across the three counties until 18:00 .
